Class ZenDiscovery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.component.AbstractComponent
      • org.elasticsearch.common.component.AbstractLifecycleComponent<Discovery>
        • org.elasticsearch.discovery.zen.ZenDiscovery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CloseableComponent, LifecycleComponent<Discovery>, Discovery, DiscoveryNodesProvider, PingContextProvider

extends AbstractLifecycleComponent<Discovery>
implements Discovery, PingContextProvider
